title: Rita Ora flashes her underwear in sheer top and racy chaps in Mexico
text:
She's a big fan of body confidence and Rita Ora showed off her incredible body when she took to the stage in Mexico on Thursday.

The 28-year-old flashed her bra underneath a sheer top which had a cold shoulder and a criss-cross lace-up detail on the sleeves.

She also showed off her briefs underneath a pair of black chaps as she put on an energetic display at the American Express Gold Event at Casino del Bosque.

Wild: Rita Ora flashed her underwear in a sheer top and racy chaps as she took to the stage for a very energetic performance at at Casino del Bosque in Mexico on Thursday

Going for it: She also showed off her briefs underneath a pair of black chaps as she put on an energetic display at the American Express Gold Event

Rita was groomed to perfection in her get-up wearing a strong berry lip and a series of gold chunky chains.

Rita recently returned for a getaway to Amanzoe hotel in Kranidi, Greece.

She looked incredible as she shared a series of swimwear shots to social media in which she showed off her gym-honed body.

An eye for detail: Rita was groomed to perfection in her get-up wearing a strong berry lip and a series of gold chunky chains

Cheeky chap-py: Rita looked incredible from every angle as she performed her dance routines

Clearly feeling reflective, she revealed that she decided to share the snaps during a 16 hour flight from Dubai to Los Angeles.

She penned: 'Why I haven’t posted these from this summer I’ll never know! I’m on a 16 hour flight from Dubai to La and I’ve gone through my photos and thought I have to share how beautiful Aman Zoe in Greece is.

'I had the best time and I am so blessed to have people around me that are so pure and kind. Nothing better then a do nothing holiday....

Throwback: Rita recently decided to share a collection of sultry throwback snaps to her Instagram from her idyllic getaway to Amanzoe hotel in Kranidi, Greece

'Well not entirely true I had to stop by Berlin to perform at Lollapalooza but went straight back to this heavenly villa.

'Thank you all at @aman for always looking after me! Swipe for some fun memories and dumb videos lol.'

Rita has been vacationing in Ras al Khaimah this week to celebrate her sister Elena Ora's early birthday, she will turn 31 on Sunday.
